author: mturk
msg: Fix obtaining security info on files for NT+. The current implementation works
only with directories, but for files we need the READ_CONTROL open flag.

author: mturk
msg: Makes the threads to behave like on posix. If the thread is created without
APR_DETACH expect that the thread_join will be called, so don't close the
handle in advance, if the thread has already finished.

author: ake
msg: WIN64: first in a series to get Windows IA64 builds clean, this serves pages
